verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David הָב֣וּ <WH3051> Give לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons אֵלִ֑ים <WH410> of the mighty הָב֥וּ <WH3051> give לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּב֥וֹד <WH3519> glory וָעֹֽז׃ <WH5797> and strength

הָב֣וּ <WH3051> Give לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> the glory שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> due unto his name הִשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <WH7812> worship לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּהַדְרַת־ <WH1927> in the beauty קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> of holiness

ק֥וֹל <WH6963> The voice יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> is over הַ֫מָּ֥יִם <WH4325> [is] upon the waters אֵֽל־ <WH410> the God הַכָּב֥וֹד <WH3519> of glory הִרְעִ֑ים <WH7481> thundereth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> is over מַ֥יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> [is] upon many
קוֹל־ <WH6963> The voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּכֹּ֑חַ <WH3581> [is] powerful ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD בֶּהָדָֽר׃ <WH1926> [is] full of majesty

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> The voice יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD שֹׁבֵ֣ר <WH7665> breaketh אֲרָזִ֑ים <WH730> the cedars וַיְשַׁבֵּ֥ר <WH7665> breaketh יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> yea the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְזֵ֥י <WH730> the cedars הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> of Lebanon

וַיַּרְקִידֵ֥ם <WH7540> He maketh them also to skip כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> like עֵ֑גֶל <WH5695> like a calf לְבָנ֥וֹן <WH3844> Lebanon וְ֝שִׂרְיֹ֗ן <WH8303> and Sirion כְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> like בֶן־ <WH1121> like a young רְאֵמִֽים׃ <WH7214> unicorn
קוֹל־ <WH6963> The voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD חֹצֵ֗ב <WH2672> divideth לַהֲב֥וֹת <WH3852> the flames אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of fire

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> The voice יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD יָחִ֣יל <WH2342> shaketh מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> the wilderness יָחִ֥יל <WH2342> shaketh יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> the wilderness קָדֵֽשׁ׃ <WH6946> of Kadesh

ק֤וֹל <WH6963> The voice יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD יְחוֹלֵ֣ל <WH2342> to calve אַיָּלוֹת֮ <WH355> maketh the hinds וַֽיֶּחֱשֹׂ֪ף <WH2834> and discovereth יְעָ֫ר֥וֹת <WH3295> the forests וּבְהֵיכָל֑וֹ <WH1964> and in his temple כֻּ֝לּ֗וֹ <WH3605> everything אֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> doth every one speak כָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> of [his] glory
יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD לַמַּבּ֣וּל <WH3999> upon the flood יָשָׁ֑ב <WH3427> sitteth וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> sitteth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> yea the LORD מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> King לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD עֹ֭ז <WH5797> strength לְעַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> unto his people יִתֵּ֑ן <WH5414> will give יְהוָ֓ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD יְבָרֵ֖ךְ <WH1288> will bless אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> his people בַשָּׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> with peace
